thread.title: Kylie breaks off engagement with fiance
thread.title_full: Kylie breaks off engagement with fiance

title: Kylie breaks off engagement with fiance

organizations.name: dylan robinson source: news corp australia

text:
Kylie Minogue and Joshua Sasse have reportedly broken up. Picture: AAP Image/Paul Miller The Sun News Corp Australia Network Share Share on Twitter 
KYLIE Minogue has ditched fiance Joshua Sasse over suspicions he has cheated on her, The Sun revealed. 
The devastated star, 48, has broken off her engagement to the British actor, 29, and thrown him out of her West London home reported The Sun. 
“She no longer trusts him,” a source said. 
A furious Minogue reportedly ordered her toyboy fiance out of her home after growing suspicious about his relationship with an actress. 
Minogue believed he had kept secret his increasing closeness to glamorous Spaniard Marta ­Milans, 34, insiders have revealed. Kylie Minogue was reportedly suspicious of Joshua Sasse’s relationship with glamorous Spaniard Marta ­Milans. Picture: David M. Benett/Dave Benett/WireImage Source: Getty Images 
The Can’t Get You Out of My Head singer suspected the British actor of cheating on her and has now removed her “beloved” engagement ring. 
Pals say she is inconsolable at the split — days after she vowed to drop her Minogue surname and become Kylie Sasse when they married. 
“She is absolutely devastated, totally heartbroken,” The source told The Sun. 
“She really believed he was The One. But she no longer trusts him.” 
Sasse is said to have bonded with Marta while filming US TV drama No Tomorrow last year in Vancouver, Canada. 
A source who worked on the show, which has since been axed, revealed: “It is well known that Joshua and Marta had been close for a number of months.” 
Minogue is said to have had a series of rows with him before travelling to Paris Fashion Week two weeks ago with her best friend, photographer Katerina Jebb. Kylie Minogue and Joshua Sasse pictured at the Ivy restaurant in December in London. Picture: Mark Milan/GC Images Source: Supplied 
When she returned, the Aussie superstar — who has had several famous lovers — asked Sasse to leave her West London home. 
He has now reportedly moved back to his family’s farm house in Leominster, ­Herefordshire. 
“It was in Paris that Kylie became suspicious and returned to London to confront Joshua.” 
“She immediately asked him to leave her home, which he had moved into at the start of the relationship.” 
On Saturday Minogue was seen for the first time without her engagement ring — a huge Art Deco-inspired sparkler. 
Posting a pic on Instagram from the recording studio, she obscured her ring finger by drawing hearts across the picture. 
But songwriter Grace Barker, who is working on Minogue’s album, also posted a photo which showed her without the ring she has worn continuously for a year. Kylie Minogue and Joshua Sasse pictured at the One For The Boys Fashion Ball in June in London. Picture: Mike Marsland/Mike Marsland/WireImage Source: Supplied 
The Sun reported that friends said they have harboured doubts for some time about the relationship, which had been “tempestuous from the start”. 
Minogue who beat breast cancer in 2005, has been pictured looking drawn in recent months — appearing to cry at a Sydney hotel with a friend in November. 
“After getting engaged she should have been on top of the world but it’s never been smooth sailing,” the source said. 
“Everyone is so upset for Kylie but her close friends and family really want her to get through this and stay strong.” 
The couple met on the set of US TV show Galavant in summer 2015. 
They quickly became an item and got engaged just months later when he proposed on holiday. 
They officially announced their engagement in February 2016. 
The couple had vowed not to wed until same-sex marriage was made legal in Australia. 
But they have both been highly vocal about their happiness together. Kylie Minogue and Joshua Sasse were vocal about same-sex marriage, vowing not to wed until it was legal in Australia. Picture: Dylan Robinson Source: News Corp Australia 
“I know I’m in love when I don’t want to be anywhere else but with her,” Sasse gushed last August. 
“As anyone who has met her will attest, she is just the most unbelievable bundle of joy. 
“It’s magic, it’s excitement and joy and sex. 
“It’s feeling like you are alive with someone else and for me, it’s someone else who really makes me feel like I am alive every day.” 
Announcing her plans to take Sasse’s surname when they tied the knot, the singer said last month: “Kylie Sasse is a great name”. 
“Kylie Minogue has never exactly tripped off the tongue.” 
Last night a source close to Minogue revealed things had been breaking down for some time. 
“It is over but Kylie has been the bigger person here — she wouldn’t sling someone out on the street. But he did leave,” the source said. 
“The reality is this situation had been bubbling under for a little while. She tried to make it work.” 
News Corp Australia has reached out to Kylie’s team for comment.
